descriptions:
["DescriptionGIVE US CALL -SEE ALL!- UNBELIEVABLE PRICE IN PALM -LUXURY FURNISHED RESIDENCE TOWER AND 7 PALM HOTEL APARTMENT!
DIRECT FROM SELLER
NO COMMISSION
WE HAVE NOW SPECIAL PROMOTION:
7 RESIDENCE IS 2 TOWER'S
RESIDENTIAL AND HOTEL APARTMENT'S
FURNITURE INCLUDED 5* QUALITY
THE PROJECT   -  READY OCT 2020.
DIRECT FROM DEVELOPER - LUXURY STUDIO,1BR,2BR,3BR,4BR ,PENTHOUSE  offering guaranteed 10% ROI for 5 Years, no service charges.
Unbeatable, the lowest prices for modern and luxury apartments on the last plot with the beach access.
Located between Nakheel Palm Mall and Dukes 5* Hotel this remarkable investment property is expected to offer as high as 10% rental yields.
7NPALM RESIDENTIAL TOWER:
Studio starts from AED 614,888
1BR starts from AED 1,000,000
2BR starts from AED 1,740,888
3BR starts from AED 3,380,888
Penthouses from AED 14,200,000
Retail spaces from AED 6,618,888
7PALM Hotel Apartments with  Guaranteed 10% ROI for 5 years.
Studio starts  from AED 855,888
1br starts from AED 1.3414.000-PARTIAL SEA VIEW
2br starts from AED 2.163.000-FULL SEA VIEW
3br starts from AED 3.491.000-FULL SEA VIEW
- Rooftop infinity pool
- High yielding opportunity
- Air-conditioned connection to the Mall
- Direct access to the beach
- Located in between two 5 star hotels
- Rooftop restaurant
- Rooftop shisha lounge
- In-room dining
- Outstanding modern finish
- Ready by Q42020
PAYMENT PLAN
5% upon Booking
4% DLD Fees upon SPA
ALL UNIT IS WITH FURNITURE- Bedrooms feature soft drawer walk-in wardrobes and en-suite bathrooms with rain showers and floating vanities. Kitchens are fully fitted with white goods and cooking range appliances plus breakfast counters. Each apartment boasts separate air-conditioning controls, giving the owner full command of the environment.
SE7EN PALM provides a desirable all-in-one way of life; luxury, convenience and harmony. With spectacular beachfront views over the Arabian Gulf, Dubai Marina Skyline and Burj Al Arab. SE7EN RESIDENCES is located on the trunk of Palm Jumeirah, opposite Nakheel Mall and next to DUKES Dubai Hotel.
CALL +971502506446"]

descriptions:
["DescriptionFuture World Real Estate is proud to present this Stunning & Spacious 1BR Apartment for Sale in Damac Celestia in Dubai South.
Property Details: 
Type:      1 BR
Status:    Fully Furnished by developer
Size:       773 square feet
View:      Community View
Parking:  1 reserved parking
Tower Features:
- Temperature-controlled swimming pool and Jacuzzi    
- Children’s pool
- State-of-the-art gymnasium
- Steam room and sauna
- Luxury spa
- Children’s play area
- Ample parking over ground floor and two basement levels
- Grand Lobby with cafes & shops
- Landscaped Garden
One of the first apartment developments in the area to be ready, Celestia furnished apartments are ideally situated in Dubai South, a master planned community conceptualised to bring its residents and visitors happiness, wellbeing and prosperity. In close proximity to the nerve centre of Expo 2020, the world’s largest aviation hub and a host of world-class facilities, it is set to become a progressive urban and economic centre offering an unrivalled quality of life.
Designed along the concept of happiness and wellbeing, Celestia offers furnished and serviced studio, 1 and 2 bedroom apartments moments from Dubai’s largest airport, Al Maktoum Airport. Celestia sets a new standard in contemporary architectural design. Each home is furnished and equipped so all you have to do is arrive. .The world class design offers plethora of retail options right outside doorstep and offers a list of amenities that are becoming important for healthy living.
For more information or to schedule a viewing, don't hesitate to call or Whatsapp Shaday at +971581008089.
Future World Real Estate is a branded company in Dubai and our people are experienced and well versed with Dubai properties. With over 20 years of property industry experience from the founder, management and our brokers we will strive to be the best in the industry. 
Company Name: Future World Real Estate Broker
RERA ORN: 949 Permit: 43018
Address: Showroom # 4, Ras Al Khor Complex 2, Nad Al Hamar
Mobile: +971581008089
Email: shaday@fw-realestate.com"]

amenities:
['Furnished
Balcony
Built in Wardrobes
Central A/C
Maid Service
Maids Room
Security
Shared Gym
Shared Pool']
descriptions:
['DescriptionExquisite Fully Renovated and extended to Half Floor | Ultra Luxurious Custom designed Upgraded
Unique Fully Furnished Apartment |Spectacular Panoramic View of Sharjah Corniche Buhaira and Al
Majaz Island View |
The apartment is located on High floor of the renowned The Blue Tower and offers mesmerizing
Panoramic views of Corniche Al Buhaira. Al Majaz Island and Emirates Eye.This flat comes with
Luxurious finishing fully furnished, after a total makeover and remodeling is the only one of kind in the
tower which combines two apartments into one apartment which covers the entire half floor, covering
9862 square feet. The Apartment boasts an open plan of two large living hall with direct access to
Balcony,a Large dining Hall, Hi-Tech 8 seaters Cinema Hall, Kids play Room, and ultra-modern open plan
kitchen with direct access to the laundry and maid’s Rooms.
The apartment has Three master bedrooms, with a beautiful bathroom which incorporates Walk in
closet. It also has three Guest rooms all en-suite each with walk in wardrobes. The Interior design and
decor enhance the modern feel, This building also comes with parking, indoor swimming pool and a gym
with state-of-the art equipment and facilities. It offers an exceptional lifestyle with a world-class
architecture and top-notched design that truly redefines grand and Luxurious living in the heart of
Sharjah.
Overview:
 Fully furnished with premium Interior fit outs
 Custom designed upgraded luxury apartment
 Two apartment converted into one huge apartment
 Two large living hall
 Two dining hall
 8 seaters Hi-Tech cinema hall
 Two lobby with direct access to guest washrooms
 Three master bedrooms en-suite with walk in closet
 Three guest bedrooms en-suite with walk in closet
 One ultra-modern open plan kitchen with direct access to laundry room
 One kids play room
 Five balconies
Overview of Blue Tower
The Blue Tower. a new creative concept in luxury living...where the unique design meets the unique
location, khalid lagoon corniche, the location of the most prestigious buildings and facilities and the
focal point for the people looking for healthy social life, the quality amenities and the tremendous views.']

title_advert: ['Build Your Dream Home in Dubai Hills Estate']
descriptions: ["DescriptionCome home to a lush green landscape dotted with some of Dubai\x92s most prestigious villas. Where your neighbors also have a penchant for the finer things in life and Downtown Dubai and the beach are just 15-20 minutes away.Emerald Hills is an enclave within Dubai Hills Estate featuring a collection of large lots of land (ranging from 7,500 - 13,000 sq. ft.) on a four-year payment-plan. Perfect luxury for those looking to build their custom-made dream villa on the golf course in one of Dubai's most beautiful golf course communities. Emerald Hills is going to be similar to the existing Fairways and Parkways enclaves within Dubai Hills Estate and Emirates Hills.A voyage into the Emerald Hills\x92 plot collection offers you an unprecedented opportunity to build your one-of-a-kind home fitted to the highest standards. Choose luxury you yourself envisioned. Play by your own rules. Be the person you were always meant to be.For bookings, please call Karim Ben Otman (BRN 26365) on +971501980358 or visit www.providentestate.com for further details.Company name: Provident Real EstateRERA ORN: 1933\xa0Address: Office #702, Al Barsha 1, Al Zarooni Bldg. Dubai (UAE"]

title_advert: ["Luxurious 2 BR Townhouse with Maid's Room by Aldar"]
amenities:
['Unfurnished
Balcony
Covered Parking
Maids Room
Pets Allowed
Security
Shared Gym
Shared Pool']
descriptions: ["DescriptionAlghadeer's visionary masterplan consists of 14,408 units, including villas, townhouses, and maisonettes. The total residential GFA is set to exceed 1.3 million sqm and will be complemented by office space, retail space, hospitality, education and community amenities. \nAt the heart of Alghadeer is HARVEST, a multi-use agricultural led space featuring allotments, as well as THE HUB – a F&B outlet, THE STUDIO – an educational area for training and workshops, THE SHED – a dedicated area for purchasing farming tools and supplies, and THE MARKET – a retail area for freshly grown produce, and THE FIELD - where people can rent plots and grow their own produce. Appealing to those who prefer wide-open spaces and unique recreational amenities, the destination will also feature lakes, running and cycle tracks, gym, camping and BBQ sites and a network of walkable gardens and parks lit entirely by solar powered lights."]

title_advert: ['Motivated Seller | Mixed Used Land For Sale']
descriptions:
["DescriptionMOTIVATED SELLER !!!
Residential  Land 
FAR 6.5  
Prime Location in a Busy Residential Community 
Next To Hotel Apartments
G+13
Dubai Residential Complex, Dubai Land
Dubai Residence Complex by Dubai Holding is a unique freehold project complementing Dubailand's entertainment and leisure destination. The development offers the highest standards of modern living, features the mosque's schools, and healthcare amenities. 
Strategically located between the Emirates and Al Ain highways, DLRC offers convenient access to the Trade Center, Academic City, Meydan Racecourse, and Dubai International City.
Opp to Dubai Silicon Oasis and adjacent to Liwan project, this area is a paradise for affordable living. Lots of demand for student accommodation and other millennial crowds.
